§ 300113. Reservation of right to amend or repeal Congress reserves the right to amend or repeal the provisions of this chapter. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1494, § 300111; renumbered § 300113, Pub. L. 110–26, § 11(a), May 11, 2007, 121 Stat. 109.)
